directions: In a large bowl, blend all the ingredients well. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving.
ingredients: 4 cups julienned Savoy or green cabbage (or 2 cups red cabbage, julienned, and 2 cups green cabbage for a more colorful presentation)
1 3/4 cups Pearl Oyster Bar Tartar Sauce
Pinch of freshly ground black pepper
title: Cabbage Slaw
